Frequency once per hour

You can cast a 3rd-level @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Summon Animal]{Summon Animal} as an innate spell, but only to summon a . At 10th level, the summon animal spell is heightened to 4th level, and you can summon a . At 12th level, your summon animal innate spell is heightened to 5th level, and you can summon a . At 14th level, it's heightened to 6th level, and you can summon a .
